item.title: My First Blog
item.description: This is the first time I use hugo to create my blog. Hugo is a powerful tool to help us build our own blog space. It helps us to be focus on the content instead of getting in the trap of technology problems. However during the proceed of learning it, I found it wouldn’t be so convenient to create our own characteristic blog, because totally we use other’s framework. That suggests I should pay more attention to master more related technologies in the future.

item.title: CV
item.description: Basic Information Name: Chen Yuhang(陈雨航) From: Department of Information Management, PeKing University Skills Python, Java, C, C++ ANN, CNN, DNN, RNN ##Research Experience Research Assistant to Professor Wang Research of poets in Tang Dynasty based on CBDB

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: "Hello, friend?" That's lame. Maybe I should give you a name?
